sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词都指"拥有权力或统治权的人"。
means: chief ： 最广泛用词，上可指最高统治者，下可指顶头上司，即可指任何一级的头头。
head ： 多指一个机构或团体等的负责人或最高首长。
leader ： 指国家、民族、政党、组织等的领导或领袖。强调领导能力、含有能够引导、指导、控制被领导者并获得其支持的意味。
boss ： 非正式用词，多作口语用，可指任何负责人，也可指经理、老板或工头。

entry.def: The leader of a group of people or an organization is the person who is in control of it or in charge of it.

example.ex: We now need a new leader of the party and a new style of leadership...
example.tran: 我们现在需要一位新的政党领袖和一种新的领导作风。

example.ex: We are going to hold a rally next month to elect a new leader.
example.tran: 我们打算下月举行集会，选举一位新的领导人。

entry.tran: （比赛或竞赛中的）领先者，占先者
entry.def: The leader at a particular point in a race or competition is the person who is winning at that point.

example.ex: The leaders came in two minutes clear of the field...
example.tran: 优胜者较其他参赛者快两分钟。

example.ex: The world drivers' championship leader crossed the line ahead of the Swede.
example.tran: 在世界车手锦标赛上，领先选手比瑞典人快一步冲线。

entry.tran: （产品或公司中的）首屈一指者，佼佼者
entry.def: The leader among a range of products or companies is the one that is most successful.

example.ex: Procter & Gamble is the leader in the mass market cosmetics industry.
example.tran: 宝洁是大众化妆品行业中的领头羊。

entry.def: The leader of an orchestra is the most senior violin player, who acts as a deputy to the conductor.
The leader of an orchestra is the conductor.
A leader in a newspaper is a piece of writing which gives the editor's opinion on an important news item.
A leader in a newspaper is the most important story in it.

means.word_mean: 1. a person who rules or guides or inspires others
2. a featured article of merchandise sold at a loss in order to draw customers

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表动词,"反复做"; 2. 表名词,"……人或物品,机器"

stems_affixes.word_buile: bat打,击+er表名连续动作→batter接连重击

stems_affixes.value_cn: 喃喃而语,小声低语;抱怨
stems_affixes.word_buile: mutt+er反复做→n.喃喃而语,小声低语;抱怨 v.低声说,抱怨
stut+er反复做→stutter口吃
bank银行+er人→n.银行家
boil沸点+er物品,机器→n.锅炉;热水贮槽
command命令,指挥+er……人或物品,机器→n.司令官,指挥官
condense凝结+er……人或物品,机器→n.冷凝器,电容器
design设计+er……人或物品,机器→n.阴谋家,设计家,制图师
employ雇用+er人→n.雇主,老板
heat热+er……人或物品,机器→n.加热的人,加热器
hijack劫持,拦路抢劫+er……人或物品,机器→n.强盗,劫盗,劫持犯
record记录+er……人或物品,机器→n.记录员,录音[像]机

labor劳动+er……人或物品,机器→n.劳动者
lead领导+er人→n.领袖,领导人;首领
light光+er物品,机器→n.打火机,引燃器
manage经营,管理+er……人或物品,机器→manager经理,管理人员
manufacture制造,加工+er人→manufacturer
observe观察+er……人或物品,机器→n.观测者,观察员,遵守者

print版,印刷+er……人或物品,机器→n.印刷工,打印机
prison监狱+er人→n.战俘

stems_affixes.value_cn: 生产者,制作者;演出人;制片人

strange陌生的+er……人或物品,机器→stranger陌生人

Sentence.sentence: Those who are likely to become innovative leaders.
Many Apple users feel themselves to be part of a community, with Mr Jobs as its leader.
Its rough estimates are meant to draw the attention of world leaders.

However,while talking is largely subconscious and rapid, writing is deliberate and slow, Over time,writers took advantage of this and started crafting long-winded sentences such as this one:The whole engagement lasted above 12 hours, till the gradual retreat of the Persians was changed into a disorderly flight, of which the shameful example was given by the principal leaders and……" No one talks like that casually — or should
Honorary degrees are often conferred on non-academic leaders in the arts,business,and politics
Behind the differences in sex, skin tones and mother tongues, there are common attitudes, expectations and ambitions which risk creating a set of clones among the business leaders of the future.

jushi.english: The leaders often go into the midst of the laboring masses.
jushi.chinese: 领导们常常深入到劳动群众当中去。

jushi.english: He's always been a follower rather than a leader.
jushi.chinese: 他一直是一个追随者,而不是领导者。

jushi.english: He is a leader in name only.
jushi.chinese: 他是一个有名无实的领导。
